title: mesutsalman
author: mesutsalman
content: 1xbet asked for various documents to confirm my account and I sent them all.My account was closed after 1 week.At the end of the e-mail, I was told that I had to withdraw the amount I deposited from the site.I checked my stock market and I have the most recent investment of $1199.I had $1179 left in my account. I got a bet of about $20.As they stated in the mail, I entered the site to withdraw the money I deposited, and I had 153 dollars in my account.I request this error to be fixed.id:521326139

comments.body: you need to fix your scam accusation, you should follow the format aioc posted and clarify the following things logfiles posted. right now I have no idea how much you deposited to the gambling site. just to be clear are you talking about 1xbet or 1xbit, despite them being owned by the same company they are two different gambling sites. also, post some screenshots/evidence backing up your claims.

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: I think I understand What OP said, even though it's confusing. Since OP is not here, I will try to answer logfiles and SaisherQuote from: logfiles on March 15, 2023, 11:50:28 PMFor starters, How much did you deposit on the site?His last deposit was $1199.QuoteHow much did you stake?His last bet was $20QuoteHow much did you win? He lose the bet.QuoteHow much have they let you withdraw so far? Not sure if he has withdrawn before. But, it seems it was not his first deposit since he said his "Most recent Investment was $1199". The case at a glance. OP deposited $1199 at 1xBet and Placed a $20 bet which he lost. Meanwhile, He triggered KYC and submitted the KYC. After one week, He got an email from 1xBet saying his account was closed but would let him withdraw his funds. He deposited $1199 and placed a $20 Bet. He should have $1179 in his account. But, When he logged in to withdraw the funds, he saw only $153 in his 1xBet Balance. He is looking for help even though we know it's a scam casino. @OP, Correct me if I am wrong. Also, Please follow the scam accusation report format as aioc suggested.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: I don't want to bust your hope of getting your deposit or with money that is left on 1XBET, but your chances are not good like all those who file complaints here, its as good as gone, worse is when they disable your account they will accuse you to make you look bad, but compared to other casinos who agreed to third party mediation, you will not hear from them anymore, they will just move on to their next target, while you feel depressed because you believe you are clean.This has been the case for many complainants here and sad to say you are one of them if they have a mindset like you when they started playing, they will likely fall to scam casinos like 1XBET.So my advice to you is to move on,  there are still a lot of good things in life and charge this to experience.

comments.author: mesutsalman
comments.body: I'm sending an e-mail to the site, give permission to login, I need to check my account activities, but it is not allowed.I don't know how much I have deposited in my account, how much I have withdrawn, because I cannot log in. I am sharing the last e-mail sent to meWe would like to inform you that we have made the decision to terminate cooperation with you (closing a gaming account) on the basis of the General provisions of the rules of the bookmaker:After the completion of the transactions, the company can make any decision in accordance with the principles of reasonable and fairness:1. blocking an account (including reopened accounts) which may require:- invalidation and cancellation of all bonuses, free bets and winnings received when using bonuses and free bets;Cancellation of all earnings received from main or reopened accounts and refund of the balance of your account at the time of commencement of transactions (excluding canceled earnings); We are also entitled to refund any amount required to be returned to us from this reopened account directly from any of your accounts (including any other secondary accounts).2. At our sole discretion (in exceptional circumstances), we allow the use of the main account and consider your main account to be valid, while all bets placed by you on the double account will be voided. The second account(s) will be blocked and/or canceled by the decision of the company (the decision is made on the basis of the analysis of all violation events on a case-by-case basis).The decision was made after a thorough review of the situation by our Security unit.We ask that you do not create a game account with our company.Given that your actions are substantially against our company's rules, the decision to terminate cooperation is final and not subject to revision.All requests from you for blocking will not be considered.You can withdraw as much as you deposited, sir.After this message, I checked the last investment in the stock market, it was 1199 dollars, but when I entered my account, there was 153 dollars, my balance was deleted.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: 1Xbit and 1Xbet are probably the worst casinos you could find. just as you found this forum to make a complaint, you could also read here a lot of accusations about the work of these casinos.Quote from: mesutsalman on March 16, 2023, 03:45:58 PMYou can withdraw as much as you deposited, sir.are you sure you are communicating with the right person from that casino? Despite the lousy reputation of 1X...casinos, the word "sir" seems to me to be from a fraudster, rather than an official.Quote from: mesutsalman on March 16, 2023, 03:45:58 PMAfter this message, I checked the last investment in the stock market, it was 1199 dollars, but when I entered my account, there was 153 dollars, my balance was deleted.is your account blocked or do you still have access to it? can you extract the betting history and all changes on your account, maybe you or someone on your behalf placed bets and lost?I don't quite understand how you don't know how much you made a deposit here. Can that $1199 be the amount with all the winnings?are they really right when they say that you had multiple accounts on their platform at the same time? If you are, then they have the right to follow their own rules and you don't have many reasons to be proud.
